channel.title: Vector Search on SearchScale
channel.description: Recent content in Vector Search on SearchScale

item.title: Building the foundations: Apache Lucene Accelerated with the NVIDIA cuVS 25.06 Release
item.description: GPU-accelerated Lucene Apache Lucene is a fast search engine with capabilities ranging from traditional TF-IDF and BM25-based search to intelligent semantic search.

item.title: Vector Search with Lucene
item.description: What is vector search The traditional lexical search works very well with structured data but what happens when we are dealing with unstructured data like images, video, raw text, etc?
